game.title: The Quest for the Amulet
game.objective: Find and return the amulet to Queen Elizabeth's castle
game.description: A perilous quest awaits brave adventurers like you. The ancient amulet is said to be safeguarded deep within the Cavern of Whispers. Success brings great honor and treasure.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, a royal decree, and the gratitude of the kingdom

task.objective: Discover the entrance to the Cavern of Whispers
task.description: The entrance can be found hidden behind a waterfall near the eastern edge of the enchanted forest. Search for clues among the ancient trees.

task.objective: Overcome the ice monster at the entrance
task.description: A formidable guardian blocks your way. You must defeat the icy creature to proceed.
Be cautious, for false passages are abundant. Follow the ancient markings to reach the chamber containing the amulet.

task.objective: Secure the amulet and return it
task.description: Once you find the amulet, return it with all due respect to the queen's chambers.
